title: Moto G30 XT2129-2 4G LTE 128GB + 4GB GSM Global Unlocked Triple Camera International Version (No US Warranty) (Not Verizon Sprint Boost Cricket) (w/Fast Car Charger Bundle) (Dark Pearl)
features: International Model, Does not have US Warranty. Will work with Most GSM SIM cards in U.S. and world Including AT&T, T-Mobile, Etc. Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Qualcomm SM6115 Snapdragon 662 (11 nm), Octa-core, Adreno 610 GPU
Rear Camera: 64MP (f/1.7) + 8MP (f/2.2) + 2MP (f/2.4, depth) + 2MP (f/2.4, macro), Front Camera: 13MP (f/2.2), Bluetooth 5.0
6.5" Max Vision, 90Hz HD+ display, 1600x720px , 269 ppi, IPS TFT LCD, 20:9 Aspect Ratio, 5000mAh Battery
description: You want brilliance. You got it. Meet moto G30. Capture ultra-high resolution photos with a 64 MP quad-camera system. And enjoy all your entertainment on a 90Hz display with a faster refresh rate for smoother viewing. Refresh your perspective: A higher refresh rate is the difference between a great display and one that’s just okay. moto g30 has a 90 Hz refresh rate, which means a smoother experience while scrolling and playing games. See all your favorite content come to life on a stunning 6.5" HD+ ultra-wide screen. Amazing from every angle: A quad-camera system lets you capture sharper, brighter high-res images from any angle. It’s the perfect camera for every memory, any way you look at it. Over 2 days of battery: Leave low battery worries behind with a 5000 mAh battery that can go over 2 days on a single charge. Stream music for 159 hours, video for 18 hours, or browse for 16 hours. Then, fuel up fast with TurboPower 20 charging that gives you up to 12 hours in just 20 minutes of charging. Works at the speed of you: The Qualcomm Snapdragon 662 octa-core 2.0 GHz processor boosts performance, so you can edit effortlessly, share quickly, and enjoy games and videos with smooth, vivid graphics. Plus, plenty of RAM means you can move back and forth between apps without missing a beat.
